api.gbuild.component.dialog

Class GDialogWithText

  • java.lang.Object
    • api.gbuild.component.GComponent
      • api.gbuild.component.dialog.GDialog
        • api.gbuild.component.dialog.GDialogWithText

  • public class GDialogWithText
extends GDialog

    Dialog that contains a text as the content

    This dialog includes at the bottom part of the component a text passed by the developer. It is important to notice that text will be added to the dialog splitting first when a break line is founded.

    Author:
    David Parre√±o Barbuzano
